metadata.title: CVE-2020-13898 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in janus-gateway (aka Janus WebRTC Server) through0.10.0. janus_sdp_process in sdp.c has a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: janus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
